page.title: 14Our Village Amenities.
page.content: Esh Winning is about 6 miles from Durham City on the B6302 road.The approximate population of our village is 3000.The biggest population is the 59 to 64 group.The population is not increasing. In the years past there were very few shops in Esh winning but throughout the years they have grown and now they form a popular little village.In one part of the village there is a cafe and it is also a video shop.Upstairs are amusements, snooker tables and pool tables.The swings are next to the BMX track which is very popular.There is a bingo for grown ups.The organised activity for juniors is the youth club and the Community Centre. The library is very good because you can take as many books as you like and you can go there to be alone.
